_comment: Example configuration for using Cloudflare API Proxy
_note1: This shows how to configure trainboard to use the Cloudflare Worker proxy instead of calling the ODPT API directly
_note2: Replace YOUR-SUBDOMAIN with your actual Cloudflare Workers subdomain
_note3: The trailing slash in API_BASE_URL is required
_note4: No ODPT_API_KEY needed - the worker handles authentication
